testCase.name: Signup should return failure on existing user uuid
Signup should return failure on existing username
Signup should fail on invalid uuid
Signin should return success with correct username/password
Signin should return failure on no existing user
Signin should return failure on wrong password
Refresh should return success valid token
Refresh should return failure on invalid token and invalidate valid tokens
Refresh should return failure on used token and invalidate valid tokens
Refresh should return failure on non existing token and let valid tokens
SignupController sould run silently and save user
SignupController sould throw exception on existing user
SigninController sould set response status code to 200 on success auth
